title: Drawing, "George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Bar/Radio Cabinet", July 11, 1934
medium: Graphite, red color pencil, and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 7904/F.S./RAND JOB/BLACK BAKELITE/CORK &BRUSHED CHROM., Olsson/D. 7/11/34, 8/9/34, 1, S.H.K.; inscribed in graphite, lower left on verso: BAR & LOVE SEAT/7904 BAR; inscribed in graphite with dimensions, materials, instructions
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawings for bar/end table. L-shaped structure, love seat to be placed on inner corner. Top surface in "blister proof" black bakelite, outer surface in dark cork, base in bakelite. Far arm of unit with rounded outer edge. Extension bar on wheels extends from lower arm of unit. Bar surface in "blister proof" black bakelite, outer surface in dark cork. Open shelf below surface with three glass trays. Open shelf below holds storage for bottles at right and ice container in Monel metal at left. Lock on front of extension bar.
